entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.8.49
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for setup installation
  • Updated translations by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9457
  • Updates for subscriptions by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9458
  • Rollback invoice requests by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9459
  • v5.8.49 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9464

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.8.48...v5.8.49
